title: John Psaropoulos
subtitle: #Greek police are evicting #refugees from the 5th high school in #Exarheia, #Athens, where they have lived for up to four years. The conservative #NewDemocracy govt has promised to "clean up" the city. Many of the children had just enrolled in school.pic.twitter.com/DLvXzzmMEF
